TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ContentDisposition extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 MIME 通訊協定內容配置標頭。

span.span: Represents a MIME protocol Content-Disposition header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的資訊類別附在電子郵件訊息傳送至其目的地時，包含附件的電子郵件訊息。The information in the class accompanies an email message that contains attachments when the email message is sent to its destination. 中的資訊可供顯示適用的寄件者的方式呈現電子郵件附件的電子郵件的軟體。The information in can be used by software that displays email to present the email attachments in the manner intended by the sender. 使用的執行個體建立電子郵件訊息的類別。Email messages are created using instances of the class. 執行個體類別用來將附件新增至電子郵件訊息。Instances of the class are used to add attachments to email messages. 若要修改附件，取得執行個體從屬性。To modify the for an attachment, get the instance from the property. 內容會顯示為訊息一部分主體具有的配置類型。Content to be displayed as part of the message body has the disposition type of . 不會顯示，但已附加到另一個檔案的內容已配置類型的。Content that is not displayed but is attached in a separate file has the disposition type of . 使用屬性，即可控制的執行個體相關聯的附件的配置類型。Use the property to control the disposition type for the attachment associated with an instance of . 檔案附件，您可以使用的屬性設定檔案大小，以及檔案的建立的日期、 上次讀取，和上次修改。For file attachments, you can use the properties of the to set the file size, as well as the date the file was created, last read, and last modified. 所有的附件中,，您可以設定建議的檔案名稱，將附件儲存在接收端電腦上。For all attachments, you can set a recommended file name in the event that the attachment is stored on the receiving computer. 方法傳回之內容配置標頭。The method returns the Content-Disposition header. 內容配置標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立電子郵件訊息與附件內嵌顯示。The following code example creates an email message with an attachment to be displayed inline. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#12)]

span.span: Gets or sets the creation date for a file attachment.

value.span: 指出檔案建立日期的 值，但如果沒有指定日期，則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來傳送電子郵件訊息中傳送的檔案時間戳記資訊。The property is used to send time stamp information with a file being sent in an email message. 這個值會設定建立日期的參數傳送的電子郵件的內容配置標頭中。This value sets the Creation-Date parameter in the Content-Disposition header sent with the email. 類別用來撰寫電子郵件訊息。The class is used to compose an email message. 類別用來將檔案附加到電子郵件。The class is used to attach a file to an email message. 若要設定，取得附件從屬性。To set , get the for the attachment from the property. 內容配置標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定此屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值可供顯示判斷正確的方式來呈現電子郵件附件的電子郵件的軟體。The property value can be used by software that displays email to determine the correct way to present the email attachments. 在使用者開啟電子郵件時，通常會顯示附件。 attachments are usually displayed when the user opens the email. 直到使用者執行某些動作，例如按一下圖示，代表附件，通常是未開啟附件。 attachments are usually not opened until the user performs some action, such as clicking an icon that represents the attachment. 內容配置標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of this property. summary.span: 取得或設定電子郵件附件的建議檔案名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the suggested file name for an email attachment.
A that contains the file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓寄件者，來建議要用來儲存收件者的電腦上的電子郵件附件的名稱。The property allows the sender to suggest the name to be used to store an email attachment on the recipient's computer. 這個名稱是建議;接收端系統可以忽略它。This name is a suggestion only; the receiving system can ignore it. 名稱不得包含路徑資訊;接收端電腦會忽略任何這類資訊。The name must not include path information; any such information is ignored by the receiving computer. 若要移除檔案名稱資訊，您可以設定此屬性`null`或空字串 ("")。To remove file name information, you can set this property to `null` or the empty string (""). 內容配置標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#11)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，以判斷電子郵件附件的配置類型 (內嵌或附件)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the disposition type (Inline or Attachment) for an email attachment.

value.span: 如果附件中的內容以內嵌方式呈現組件的電子郵件內文中;否則， 。

span.span: if content in the attachment is presented inline as part of the email body; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會設定傳送電子郵件訊息的內容配置標頭中的配置類型。The property sets the disposition type in the Content-Disposition header sent with the email message. 配置類型可供顯示判斷正確的方式來呈現電子郵件附件的電子郵件的軟體。The disposition type can be used by software that displays email to determine the correct way to present the email attachments. 附件的配置類型通常會顯示在使用者開啟電子郵件時。Attachments with a disposition type of are usually displayed when the user opens the email. 附件的配置類型通常不會開啟直到使用者執行一些額外的動作，例如按一下表示附件的圖示。Attachments with a disposition type of are usually not opened until the user performs some additional action, such as clicking an icon that represents the attachment. 內容配置標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of this property.
